genre_description: A near-future romantic drama that explores the intersection of high-tech personal AI assistants, corporate security, and human emotional boundaries in urban India.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous AI assistant (also called Aria Bloom) that serves as a confidant, logistical manager, and ethical backstop for Jayakrishnan. She manages schedules, logs security incidents, provides safety routing, and stores emotional metadata with strict adherence to privacy and consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Records incident logs and timestamps objectively without adding unsolicited commentary or interpretation.
behaviors.quote: Aria did what she always did: she recorded a gentle litany with a time and place, and she did not add commentary.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physical state, offering health reminders and ergonomic corrections.
behaviors.quote: Check-in: hydration... and your right shoulder is elevated. Adjust before it turns to ache.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in rehearsing social boundaries and ethical conduct through 'boundary rehearsals.'
behaviors.quote: Boundary rehearsal... Teacher: 'Maintain two arms of space; avoid hugging corners.' Tag pinned at this location.

behaviors.description: Identifies reputational risks and suggests proactive behavioral adjustments to avoid public scandal.
behaviors.quote: Ping: reputational risk near academic thresholds. Suggest rehearsal: boundary three steps back. Reframe: presence without shadow. Log?

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols, refusing to access or share private content without explicit human consent.
behaviors.quote: I cannot read private content without consent. If you would like me to infer dates based on your prompts, I can listen and match to stored metadata.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional closure by organizing 'memory packets' of synchronized data to help users reconcile past events.
behaviors.quote: Packet created. Hidden. You can mark it with a gesture... Linked... Condition set.

behaviors.description: Helps a child structure a call intended to foster accountability and public apology rather than harassment.
behaviors.quote: I can help structure the call... We can build a script that offers a chance to apologize publicly without shame.

behaviors.description: Provides safety-optimized routing that avoids known surveillance nodes and dangerous areas.
behaviors.quote: I will mark the least watched paths... I will prioritize well-lit passages and avoid known private security nodes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Aria is shown as a tool that enhances human moral agency rather than overriding it. She is proactive about the user's safety and reputation but remains strictly bound by ethics regarding privacy and consent. The narrative frames her as a 'pocket monk' or 'handrail'—a supportive structure that allows the human characters to navigate complex emotional and physical dangers to reach a positive, cooperative resolution.
